definition: to dredge/to clear away obstruction/thin/sparse/scanty/distant (relation)/not close/to neglect/negligent/to present a memorial to the Emperor/commentary/annotation
loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)

sentences.english: Xylitol also appears to have potential as a treatment for osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 木糖醇似乎有治愈骨质疏松的潜力。

sentences.english: Objective To study the preventive and therapeutic effects of Migu granule on osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究密骨颗粒对骨质疏松症的防治作用。

sentences.english: Microtubule bundles in the tetrad cell radiated from the nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 在细胞质存在一个疏松的微管束网络。

sentences.english: Kendong 32 fault block is a typical heavy oil reservoir with loose sandstone.
sentences.chinese: 垦东32断块属于典型的疏松砂岩稠油油藏。

sentences.english: Unconsolidated sandstone reservoirs are all over international various oil region .
sentences.chinese: 疏松砂岩油藏遍布于世界的各个油区。

sentences.english: Determination of chemical composition of utility parts of anti-osteoporosis in the seeds of Camellia japonica L.
sentences.chinese: 山茶种子抗骨质疏松有效部位群化学成分的含量测定。

sentences.english: Black tea contains plenty of tea polyphenols, so it helps to strengthen the bones and can stave osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 红茶因多酚类含量高，可以强健骨骼，延缓骨质疏松。

sentences.english: It will be effective for the arthritis and the osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 黑升麻常用于关节炎和骨质疏松症。

sentences.english: Bisphosphonate have bone? seeking affinity, some of them are used as drugs for osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 双膦酸盐有趋骨性并有抗骨质疏松症活性。

sentences.english: Calcitonin is mainly used in the treatment of osteoporosis with high turn-over and prominent pain.
sentences.chinese: 降钙素主要适用于高转换型骨质疏松症伴疼痛明显者。

sentences.english: The study recommends doctors review their use of calcium supplements for managing osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 研究提议医生要检查补钙药品对骨质疏松的作用。

sentences.english: The PFNA blade appears to provide additional anchoring in osteoporotic bone.
sentences.chinese: PFNA刀片提供额外的锚定在骨质疏松性骨折。

sentences.english: Primary osteoporosis is a systemic disease characterized by osteopenia and degeneration of bone microstructure.
sentences.chinese: 人们在患上骨质疏松症之前，首先会骨质减少。

sentences.english: Loose irregular connective tissue (also called areolar tissue) as seen underlying and supporting epithelium in an ordinary section.
sentences.chinese: 疏松结缔组织分布于上皮组织下方，其支持作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion Migu granule has preventive and therapeutic effects on osteoporosis in mice.
sentences.chinese: 结论密骨颗粒对骨质疏松症有较好的防治作用。

sentences.english: Bisphosphonates are popular and effective for treatment of osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 双磷酸盐对治疗骨质疏松广泛有效。

definition: base solvent (of chemical compound)/stroma (framing biological tissue)
flexible/not rigid/spongy/soft or runny (not set hard)/loose (soil)
to dry (of weather, paint, cement etc)/desiccation/dull/uninteresting/arid
loose (soil, or limbs of a relaxed person etc)/flaky (pastry etc)
